  • Constructor Details

    • SoundAsset

      public SoundAsset(String path, org.bukkit.SoundCategory source, File soundFile)
      Parameters:
      path - The path name for the sound file. Examples: entity.enderman block.sand
      source - The SoundSource this sound plays from
      soundFile - The .ogg file to play when this sound is played.

    • SoundAsset

      public SoundAsset(String path, org.bukkit.SoundCategory source, boolean stream, File soundFile)
      Parameters:
      path - The path name for the sound file. Examples: entity.enderman block.sand
      source - The SoundSource this sound plays from
      stream - If the sound should be streamed from the File instead of played at once. Use this if your sound is long, such as a music disc.
      soundFile - The .ogg file to play when this sound is played.

  • Method Details

    • isStreamed

      public boolean isStreamed()
      Returns:
      If the sound asset is streamed.

    • getCategory

      public org.bukkit.SoundCategory getCategory()
      Returns:
      The SoundCategory that this sound will play from.

    • getSoundFile

      public File getSoundFile()
      Returns:
      The File to the .ogg

    • getPath

      public String getPath()
      Returns:
      The path that is used to play this sound in game.

    • getResourceSoundsFolder

      public File getResourceSoundsFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the namespaced sound resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/pluginName/sounds
